Title: Dolittle
Writer: Stephen Gaghan (screenplay by), Dan Gregor (screenplay by), Doug Mand (screenplay by), Thomas Shepherd (screen story by), Hugh Lofting (character created by)
Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Antonio Banderas, Michael Sheen, Jim Broadbent
Plot: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.
Production: Perfect World Pictures, Universal Pictures, Team Downey
